line.text: No more be grieved at that which thou hast done
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Roses have thorns and silver fountains mud
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Clouds and eclipses stain both moon and sun
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And loathsome canker lives in sweetest bud
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All men make faults and even I in this
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My self corrupting salving thy amiss
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Excusing thy sins more than thy sins are
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For to thy sensual fault I bring in sense
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy adverse party is thy advocate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And gainst my self a lawful plea commence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Such civil war is in my love and hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That I an accessary needs must be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To that sweet thief which sourly robs from me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
